snippet: Bart Hernandez was charged with illegal smuggling of Cuban baseball players to the United States, a spokesman for Homeland Security Investigations said.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Miami grand jury indicts baseball agent Bart Hernandez for human trafficking in connection with 2010 smuggling of Cuban outfielder Leonys Martin into United States; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bart Hernandez was charged with illegal smuggling of Cuban baseball players to the United States, a spokesman for Homeland Security Investigations said.

headline.main: U.S. Accuses Sports Agent of Smuggling Leonys Martin
headline.print_headline: U.S. Accuses Sports Agent of Smuggling Cuban Player
